Horde infighting
The mountain takes its toll. A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.
When besieged
The population of this besieged settlement is dying from malnutrition.

This army has been sabotaged; many have lost their lives.

Regionless
Lands under the dominion of a Vampire take on a dread aspect – there is no sustenance here for the living, as their very life essence is leeched from their bodies.
Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in a region suffering the Plague of the Crow.
Horde armies positioned in close proximity will begin infighting, and suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.
The elements show their true power over deep waters, endlessly buffeting the fleet and bringing death to mariners.
Vampire territory
Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in desert regions.
Rite of Sotek (Lizardmen territory)
Everyone suffers during a lengthy blockade. Keeping the fleet out to sea hurts everyone.
Chaos territory
The barren wastelands are vast, hostile and food is scarce - such inhospitable lands are not meant for the living.

Sandstorm
With no region to call home, this force is suffering from [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition.
This fleet is being devoured by a maelstrom. Set sail and exit now!
This fleet has strayed into Amanar’s waters – the vessels are being battered by the beast’s belligerence!
Most travellers that enter Athel Loren are found on its outskirts as little more than gibbering wrecks, their sanity shredded by whatever horrors they witnessed in the magical forest.
Besieging a settlement also takes its toll on the besiegers, as disease and small skirmishes claim the weak.
Without supplies coming in from sea trade routes this settlement grows hungry.

A recent event has caused this army to suffer losses! Oh, cruel gods, when will it pass?
Blighted by the forces of Chaos, the ground has become hard as iron and the howling winds cut like daggers of purest cold.

This fleet is suffering [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attritional losses as it is blockading.
A plague unleashed upon the world by the Northern God known as the Crow. Great haste in the opposite direction is the only thing that may save them from this unending blight!
This army will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition while in Lizardmen territory when the Rite of Sotek is active.
All perish in the desert! A wise Lord would find a road or leave this place.
